parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful, required for all requests

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Example: 1611569999

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: Use token in API Config, using to identify your permission to API, refer to multiple use of a token

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for shop api only

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generated by partner_id, api_path, timestamp, access_token, and shop_id according to rule: Base64(hash_hmac('sha256', sorted_params, partner_key))

response_fields.name: request_id
response_fields.description: The identifier for an API request

response_fields.name: error
response_fields.description: Indicate error type if error exists

response_fields.name: message
response_fields.description: Indicate error detail if error exists

children.name: status
children.description:
the status of new flash sale
0: deleted
1: ongoing
2: expired
3: cancel_rejected
